text: For anyone interested, HubSpot completely broke v2 signatures. It took me ages to get an answer from support but eventually they found the issue and had already fixed it.

Hi all :wave:,

Is there anyone who tried to deploy a HubSpot app on  Hub CMS? Just curious, is it sufficient to use Serverless functions and CMS for that only?  :thinking_face:

Hello
I use the WP Gravity Forms plugin and I need to send data on each step of the multistep form. At least I want to send name and email from the first form step and after, if the user finished form I want to send data again to the HS 
 
The question is: is it possible to send data from Gravity Form to HS on each form step. If so, how can I configure sending?
Does anyone know which API resource will allow access to emails?
does <https://www.gravityforms.com/add-ons/HubSpot/|this add on> not accomplish that?

I'm using the engagement getAssociated api to return engagements associated to a ticket and it returns NOTE and EMAIL and everything...but when I use the owners api to get the owner by the id returned on ownerId I sometimes run into 404, depending on the ownerId returned...anyone know what might be happening?
can a owner seize to exist?
